text:
Hey!

I'm Aniroodh, a Website/ Email Copywriter for B2B SaaS companies.

I can help you turn your traffic and lead magnet downloaders into free trials and booked demos through

1) Bringing out your product value proposition
2) The benefits of every capability of your product
3) Making competition irrelevant with strong positioning
4) Showcasing the pain of their world without your offer

Always open to chat about copywriting, positioning, A Song of Ice and Fire, or football!
Connect with me through DM or at <https://www.linkedin.com/in/aniroodh-n-b52647149|https://www.linkedin.com/in/aniroodh-n-b52647149>
